input.sentences: [female] and her kids went on a vacation to location
there was a festival about smurfs | kids were really excited to take pictures with it
they think burning idols | burns away evils in society
it actually binds people together too and makes everyone really happy
output.sentences: My family decided to take an exotic vacation in China, and one of the location we liked the best was going to Inner Mongolia with the kids.
The village was promoting their first movie the Smurfs, and they had a giant smurf was a great picture spot for my kids.
The giant smurf was actually a giant bonfire pit, and people were starting the process of burning it.
In their society, they do this tradition in they burn idols or spirits to get rid of their evils.
Seeing my kids and the local people all participate in watching it burn makes me and my husband happy we decided to do an out of the ordinary trip.
